class.name: Streamlines
class.documentation: Magics parameters exist to control the calculation and plotting of streamlines.

parameter.name: wind_streamline_min_density
parameter.documentation: The minimum number of streamlines to be plotted in one square cm of the user's subpage

parameter.name: wind_streamline_min_speed
parameter.documentation: Wind speed below which streamline plotting will be stopped

parameter.name: wind_streamline_head_shape
parameter.documentation: Table number, XY, indicating shape of arrowhead X

parameter.name: wind_streamline_head_ratio
parameter.documentation: Table number, XY, indicating style and shape of arrowhead X
